io.smudgr.app.threads

Class ViewThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.app.threads.AppThread
      • io.smudgr.app.threads.ViewThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ViewThread
extends AppThread
    The ViewThread is responsible for taking the last frame rendered Rack.getLastFrame() and passing it to a given View instance, with a default rate of Controller.TARGET_FPS.
    See Also:
    Project.getRack(), Controller.add(Object)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewThread(View view)
      Instantiate a new ViewThread for the given View
